languages.text: {n}Потрескавшиеся губы, работая в тандеме с пылающими легкими, исторгают одно за другим слова хорошо знакомой вам молитвы. Каждая изреченная строка наполняет тело Его светом, придающим сил и сокрушающим боль, словно сам Император повелевает вам встать. Вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Потрескавшиеся губы, работая в тандеме с пылающими легкими, исторгают одно за другим слова хорошо знакомой вам молитвы. Каждая изреченная строка наполняет тело Его светом, придающим сил и сокрушающим боль, словно сам Император повелевает вам встать. Вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Потрескавшиеся губы, работая в тандеме с пылающими легкими, исторгают одно за другим слова хорошо знакомой вам молитвы. Каждая изреченная строка наполняет тело Его светом, придающим сил и сокрушающим боль, словно сам Император повелевает вам встать. Вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cracked lips work in tandem with the burning lungs expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain as if the Emperor himself commanded you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你开裂的嘴唇与火烧火燎的肺部合作着，颂唱出了那些你熟悉的祷词，每句话都让你的身体充满了祂的明光。这些祈祷赐予了你力量，驱散了你的痛苦，就仿佛帝皇本人在命令你站起来一样。你再次尝试着站起身来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你开裂的嘴唇与火烧火燎的肺部合作着，颂唱出了那些你熟悉的祷词，每句话都让你的身体充满了祂的明光。这些祈祷赐予了你力量，驱散了你的痛苦，就仿佛帝皇本人在命令你站起来一样。你再次尝试着站起身来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ひび割れた唇が燃えるように痛む肺と連動して、聞き慣れた祈りの言葉を吐き出す。祈りを捧げるごとに皇帝の御光が身体を満たし、まるで皇帝自身が起き上がれと命じているかのように痛みが引いていく。もう一度立ち上がろうとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ひび割れた唇が燃えるように痛む肺と連動して、聞き慣れた祈りの言葉を吐き出す。祈りを捧げるごとに皇帝の御光が身体を満たし、まるで皇帝自身が起き上がれと命じているかのように痛みが引いていく。もう一度立ち上がろうとした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus labios agrietados colaboran con tus pulmones abrasados para emitir las familiares palabras de una oración. Cada frase que consigues recitar llena tu cuerpo de Su luz, otorgándote fuerzas y disipando el dolor, como si el mismo Emperador te ordenara levantarte. Vuelves a intentarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus labios agrietados colaboran con tus pulmones abrasados para emitir las familiares palabras de una oración. Cada frase que consigues recitar llena tu cuerpo de Su luz, otorgándote fuerzas y disipando el dolor, como si el mismo Emperador te ordenara levantarte. Vuelves a intentarlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos lèvres gercées œuvrent de concert avec vos poumons en feu pour prononcer une prière familière. Chaque phrase baigne votre corps dans Sa lumière, vous redonne de la force et estompe la douleur, comme si l'Empereur lui-même vous ordonnait de vous relever. Vous faites une autre tentative.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos lèvres gercées œuvrent de concert avec vos poumons en feu pour prononcer une prière familière. Chaque phrase baigne votre corps dans Sa lumière, vous redonne de la force et estompe la douleur, comme si l'Empereur lui-même vous ordonnait de vous relever. Vous faites une autre tentative.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine aufgesprungenen Lippen und deine brennende Lunge versuchen gemeinsam, die bekannten Worte des Gebets zu formen. Jede gesprochene Zeile erfüllt deinen Körper mit Seinem Licht, gibt dir Kraft und lindert den Schmerz, als würde der Imperator selbst dir befehlen, aufzustehen. Du versuchst es erneut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine aufgesprungenen Lippen und deine brennende Lunge versuchen gemeinsam, die bekannten Worte des Gebets zu formen. Jede gesprochene Zeile erfüllt deinen Körper mit Seinem Licht, gibt dir Kraft und lindert den Schmerz, als würde der Imperator selbst dir befehlen, aufzustehen. Du versuchst es erneut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çatlamış dudakların ve yanan ciğerlerin, ortaklaşa bir gayret göstererek tanıdık bir dua okumaya başlıyor. Söylediğin her bir sözcük; içini O'nun ışığıyla daha da çok dolduruyor, sana güç veriyor ve acıyı uzaklaştırıyor. Sanki İmparator Hazretleri bizzat sana kalkmanı emrediyor. Bir kez daha deniyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your cracked lips work in tandem with your burning lungs to expel the familiar words of prayer. Each uttered line fills your body with His light, giving you strength and driving away the pain, as if the Emperor Himself is commanding you to rise. You make another attempt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çatlamış dudakların ve yanan ciğerlerin ortaklaşa bir gayret göstererek, tanıdık bir dua okumaya başlıyorlar. Söylediğin her bir sözcük, içini O'nun ışığıyla daha da çok dolduruyor, sana güç veriyor ve acıyı uzaklaştırıyor. Sanki sana kalkmanı İmparator Hazretleri bizzat emrediyor gibi. Bir kez daha deniyorsun.{/n}
